divs: sighting detailsdriving northon 220 \bassett forks, driving to roanoke,va for date, saw bright like in sky\hovering, pulled over asap and there were 3 teens already pulled over to look up! we were afraid , it hoverd over the steepele of a church that i have all ways liked, i am a military a aircraft identifier\ artillery and aviation. this air craft did not make any sound . just blinding white like that is not used on us aircraft.it was not a spot lite to land. it moved fromside to side 2 times and then just took off toward 220 south, same route as rode,we jumper in our cars and took off as fast as we could. i drove 120 mph ,s to get away for 40 miles to roanoke, it would be nice to find the three kids\teens\adults now that pulled over at the furniture company\store that nite andseen the ufo over the church.i maybe thought it was project from tech, but no! it was not from this world,it made not even sound over cars still traveling nt\south. bassett,va siteing near golf course.
